nowShowing.title: Dune: Part Two
nowShowing.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

nowShowing.title: The Batman
nowShowing.description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

nowShowing.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
nowShowing.description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

nowShowing.title: Oppenheimer
nowShowing.description: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

comingSoon.title: Mission: Impossible 8
comingSoon.description: Ethan Hunt returns in the eighth installment of the Mission: Impossible franchise for another high-stakes international espionage mission.

comingSoon.title: Avatar 3
comingSoon.description: The third installment in the Avatar franchise continues the epic saga of Pandora and the conflict between humans and the indigenous Na'vi population.

comingSoon.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
comingSoon.description: Wade Wilson teams up with Wolverine in this highly anticipated crossover that brings together two of Marvel's most beloved antiheroes.

comingSoon.title: Furiosa
comingSoon.description: A prequel to Mad Max: Fury Road, this film explores the origin story of the fierce warrior Imperator Furiosa before she teamed up with Mad Max.
